src:
Milošević: Trebala nam je ovakva pobeda
02 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Darko
Trener fudbalera Partizana Savo Milošević izjavio je da je njegov tim ostvario važnu pobedu protiv Vojvodine. Crno-beli su u 15. kolu Superlige pobedili Novosađane 4:0.
– Moram da budem nedosledan sebi, nije trebalo ni danas da se pojavim na konferenciji, da ne ispadne da samo dolazim kada pobedimo. Veoma bitna pobeda za nas, posle svega onog što se izdešavalo protiv Čukaričkog, plus imajući u vidu ono što dolazi. Trebala nam je jedna dobra pobeda i ovakav rezultat. Igrali smo derbi protiv jedne od najozbiljnijih ekipa u ligi. Mislim da je igra tokom svih 90 minuta bila na onom nivou na kom smo pokazali da možemo, rekao je Milošević novinarima posle meča, prenosi Tanjug.
On je čestitao svojim igračima na reakciji i dodao da se nada da posle ovog rezultata neće „poleteti“.
– Nije bilo lako, ispada tako. Mi smo sve utakmice, u kojima smo uspevali da postignemo gol u prvom poluvremenu, rešavali jednostavno. I kod nas i u Ligi Evrope. Danas smo imali sreću da mi postignemo prvi gol i da ne moramo da jurimo rezultat. Otvorila nam se utakmica i to nam je sigurno olakšalo današnju pobedu, rekao je Milošević.
Partizan je ove sezone dobro igrao protiv vodećih ekipa u prvenstvu, dok su kiksevi dolazili u „manjim utakmica“.
– Ako je to tačno, onda nam sledi pakao u narednih šest kola. Nadam se da ćemo izvući pouke iz tih utakmica. Slažem se da smo imali lošu koncetraciju i nedovoljno dobar voljni momenat. Nema lakih utakmica. Danas se videla razlika kada od prvog minuta uđete koncentrisano, ali ako samo pet odsto spustite taj nivo imate problem sa svakom ekipom u ligi, zaključio je Milošević.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Milosevic: We needed a win like this
02 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Darko
Partizan football coach Savo Milosevic said his team had an important win against Vojvodina. The Black and Whites beat the Novi Sad 4-0 in the 15th round of the Super League.
- I have to be inconsistent with myself, I didn't even have to appear at the conference today, so it doesn't turn out that I only come when we win. A very important victory for us, after all that stood out against Cukaricki, plus considering what was coming. We needed one good win and a result like this. We played a derby against one of the most serious teams in the league. I think that the game during the 90 minutes was at the level where we showed that we can, Milosevic told reporters after the match, Tanjug reports.
He congratulated his players on his reaction and added that he hoped he would not "take off" after this result.
- It wasn't easy, it turns out. We solved all the games in which we managed to score in the first half. Both here and in the Europa League. We were lucky today to score the first goal and not have to rush the score. The match opened for us and that certainly made it easy for us to win today, Milosevic said.
Partizan have played well against leading teams in the Championship this season, with the Bicks coming in "smaller games".
- If that is true, then hell will follow in the next six rounds. I hope we can draw lessons from those matches. I agree that we had a bad concentration and not enough goodwill. There are no easy matches. Today you can see the difference when you enter concentrated from the first minute, but if you drop only five percent of that level you have a problem with every team in the league, Milosevic concluded.
